entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain or wet snow beginning this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 7. POP 60%
